invocations.description: Will set the ARGB color for the border to be drawn around shapes. If you don't want a border for shapes pass -1 as the color. This function also sets the border color for texts, if a border width has been specified in the setfontstyle function.
invocations.exDescription: Will draw a rectangle with a white border.

invocations.description: Will set the ARGB name for the border to be drawn around shapes. As colorname you can use 'aqua', 'black', 'blue', 'fuchsia', 'gray', 'green', 'lime', 'maroon', 'navy', 'olive', 'pink', 'purple', 'red', 'silver', 'teal', 'white' or 'yellow'.
